roleset.name: misunderstanding
roleset.note: MISPERCEPTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Corresponds to VNcls sight-30.2, characterize-29.2. Relation to perceive.01 (from misperception.01-n)

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: But far from its misperception as an ?old man's disease,? prostate cancer affects one in six men.

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: They drink more than they otherwise would to fit in with their misperception of the group norm for college drinking.
example.arg: of the group norm for college drinking

example.name: with adj
example.text: One of the most common misperceptions is that the Mosuo are very promiscuous , changing partners all the time .
